A plea for almes delivered in a sermon at the spital, before a solemn assembly of the city, on Tuesday in Easter week, April. 13. 1658. / By Thomas Watson Minister of Stephens Walbrook. Lond. Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
[8], 68 p.
Printed for Thomas Parkhurst at the three Crowns over-against the great Conduit at the lower end of Cheap-side, London : 1658.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
